message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm starting the negotiations at $18,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $15,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $16,500?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $16,000. How about we try $16,200? I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offers.
